subject:
2010 AWARD NOTIFICATION S.A (CONGRATULATIONS) CONTACT YOUR CLAIM AGENT
 IMMEDIATLY
body:
CONGRATULATIONS!!!


Euro Afro American Lottery  Promotion Switzerland:    


              FROM THE DESK OF PROMOTIONS MANAGER: 
INTERNATIONAL PROMOTIONS/PRIZE AWARD DEPARTMENT
                          FOR THE 2010 SA WORLD CUP BID

      Joker number:     


 
 

Attention: Winner,       
 
We happily announce to you the draw of South African 2010 World cup Bid 
lottery Award International programs held in Zurich, Switzerland.Your  
e-mail address attached to ticket number:B966575604546199 with!  
Serial number 97560 drew the winning:60/84/27/17/36,which 
subsequently won you the lottery award in the 2nd category.
 
CONGRATULATIONS! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!



 
Your name has therefore been approved to claim a total sum of US$5,000.000.00 
(Five million United States Dollars) in cash credited to file number 
KPC/9030108308/03.This is from a total cash prize of $15,000,000.00 (Fifteen million United States dollars) shared among the first Three (3)lucky winners in this 
category worldwide.
 
Please note that your lucky winning number falls within our lottery 
booklet representative office in South Africa as indicated in the play 
coupon. In view of this, your $5,000.000.00 (Five Million United States 
Dollars) would be released to you through the assistance of our agent
in South Africa, who will immediately commence the winning process to 
facilitate the release of your Prize to you once you contact him.

 

All participants were selected randomly from Worldwide Web site through 
computer draw system and extracted from over 100,000,00 companies and 
individual email addresses.The lottery program took place to promote 
South Africa`s 2010 world cup award. 
 
Please you are advised to file for your claim through our Claim Agent
Dr.James Sibiko immediately you receive this message:
 immediatly and feed below information:

ADDRESS:...............................

Email Address   :jamessibikoclaimagent_2010bid@yahoo.co.uk 
Email Address   :jsibiko@aim.com/claimagen@aim.com
Phone Number :+27-82-058-2221.
Fax     Numbe  :+27-86-607-8222.

 
Please note that due to mix up of some numbers and names, we ask that you keep your winning information confidential until your claims have been fully processed and your money Remitted to you. This is part of our security protocol to avoid multiple claims and unwarranted abuse of this program . 

 

N.B: Any breach of confidentiality on the part of the winners will result to disqualification. Please do not reply to this mail. Contact your claims agent. 

 
 




LAST WINNERS ON THE 2010 SA WORLD CUP BID LOTTERY PROMOTIONS
 



 

 
 Euro Afro American Lottery Promotion Switzerland.
 
Congratulations.
 
Your Sincerely,
 
Mrs.Potia Dube.
Promotions Manager 2010 Bid
